name: undenominational
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not connected with a particular religious group : The school is strictly undenominational, but the spiritual training of the students is not neglected.
More examplesFewer examplesShe tried to foster an undenominational spirit that encouraged fellowship with other Christian groups.An undenominational board of trustees has the control of the institution.We preferred a school that would be secular and undenominational.
